sourcesContent:
import { createSlice } from '@reduxjs/toolkit'

const initialState = [
    { id: '1', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '2', productName: 'Banana', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-05-12', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Apple', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '4', productName: 'Spinach', description: 'Baby Spinach', canExpire: false, expiryDate: '', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '5', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '6', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '7', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'vegetables', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '8', productName: 'Fish', description: 'Salmon 2.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-08-12', category: 'meat', price: '£8.00', special: false},
    { id: '9', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '10', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '11', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '12', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '13', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
    { id: '3', productName: 'Meat', description: 'Mutton 1.5kg', canExpire: true, expiryDate: '2024-10-12', category: 'meat', price: '£10.00', special: false},
  ]

export const productSlice = createSlice({
  name: 'products',
  initialState,
  reducers: {
    addProduct: (state, action) => {
        state.push(action.payload)
    },
    removeProduct: (state, action) => {

        state = initialState
    }  
  }
})

export const { addProduct, removeProduct } = productSlice.actions

export default productSlice.reducer
